net.minecraftforge.fml.repackage.com.nothome.delta

Class GDiffWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.repackage.com.nothome.delta.GDiffWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, DiffWriter

    public class GDiffWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DiffWriter
    Outputs a diff following the GDIFF file specification available at http://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-gdiff-19970901.html.
